text:
"Yours Truly" is the debut studio album by American singer and actress Ariana Grande. It was released in September, 2013.
"Yours Truly" debuted at number one on the US "Billboard" 200. It sold 138,000 copies in its opening week. Internationally, the album reached the top-ten position in Australia, Canada, Denmark, Ireland, Japan, the Netherlands and the United Kingdom. It had sold 596,000 copies in the US as of April 2018.
